head.title: Catawba County Schools - Coronavirus Information - CCS Coronavirus Updates

meta.content: Catawba County Schools families, First, thank you for your patience and flexibility as we all navigate our "new normal" for now. Our primary concern during the COVID-19 mandatory closures is the...

body.class: header-page page-has-banner wsite-theme-light wsite-page-index banner-overlay-off alternate-banner-off sticky-nav-on minicart-total-on

strong.font: Bookmark this page to stay up to date on all information related to the At-Home Learning Period for Catawba County Schools.

span.span:
Catawba County Schools families,
First, thank you for your patience and flexibility as we all navigate our "new normal" for now. Our primary concern during the COVID-19 mandatory closures is the safety and well-being of our students and employees. We have put together a plan that will ensure that our
students are fed, our employees are paid, and our students continue learning - all while doing our part to help limit the spread of COVID-19

.
Second, we have developed this new website as a hub for all of our communications during the closures. Please bookmark this website and use it to get the most up-to-date, official information from our school district. Please use the links and menu above to navigate to the information that is most important to you.

div.span: The district and your individual principals will continue to communicate through all of our regular channels as well - email, text, phone, and social media. If you have any questions, please contact your schools and your teachers. We are all here to help you and your students.

strong.font: Stay up to date by following us on social media: Facebook | Twitter | Instagram

font.font: Even if you do not have Facebook, Instagram, or Twitter, you can still see what we are up to on social media by checking out our feeds below.
